articles.author: Robert Hart
articles.title: Ozempic And Wegovy Not Linked To Uptick In Suicidal Thoughts, Study Finds - Forbes
articles.description: The finding comes as health agencies in Europe and the U.S. investigate potential side effects like increased suicidal thoughts and hair loss for the popular drugs.
articles.content: Weight loss and diabetes drugs Wegovy and Ozempic are not linked to an increase in suicidal thoughts, according to research published in Nature Medicine Friday, an encouraging finding for consumers a… [+4922 chars]
